about_the_game: Experience King of Vikings adventures the way it was intended. The titillating and epically uncensored version worthy of drawing your sword for glory and spoils.

content_descriptors.notes: King of Vikings involves the main character having sexual encounters with female characters. It includes sexual themes and depictions featuring undressing, nudity and sexual interactions. Depictions are consensual between all parties.

detailed_description: Experience King of Vikings adventures the way it was intended. The titillating and epically uncensored version worthy of drawing your sword for glory and spoils.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: King of Vikings Adults Only 18+ Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
